channel.title: Port Forwarding my server in verizon
channel.description:
Sorry think i put this in the wrong place before
Can someone help me fill out these fields? Im using a verizon router..
Networked computer/device:__________ specify address:________________ Protocol(there isn't one named tcp):____________________ WAN Connection type:______________ Forward to port: either same as incoming port or a specific one.. When should this rule occur?: always or specify schedule port: tcp right?
